metadata.title: CVE-2012-6684 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the RedCloth library 4.2.9 forRuby and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via a javascript: URI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-redcloth - 4.3.2-3build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-redcloth package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-3build1').
